channel.title: CVE Feed for Hitachi Vantara -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Hitachi Vantara -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-28983|2024-06-27T14:48:13.210Z -- hitachi%20vantara -- pentaho%20business%20analytics%20server
item.description: Hitachi Vantara Pentaho Business Analytics Server prior to versions 10.1.0.0 and 9.3.0.7, including 8.3.x allow a malicious URL to inject content into the Analyzer plugin interface.

item.title: CVE-2023-5617|2024-02-28T22:30:40.128Z -- hitachi%20vantara -- pentaho%20data%20integration%20%26%20analytics
item.description: Hitachi Vantara Pentaho Data Integration & Analytics versions before 10.1.0.0 and 9.3.0.6, includingÂ 9.5.x and 8.3.x, display the version of Tomcat when a server error is encountered.

item.title: CVE-2024-28982|2024-06-26T22:37:01.285Z -- hitachi%20vantara -- pentaho%20business%20analytics%20server
item.description: Hitachi Vantara Pentaho Business Analytics Server versions before 10.1.0.0 and 9.3.0.7, including 8.3.x do not correctly protect the ACL service endpoint of the Pentaho User Console against XML External Entity Reference.

item.title: CVE-2024-28984|2024-06-26T22:41:57.450Z -- hitachi%20vantara -- pentaho%20business%20analytics%20server
item.description: Hitachi Vantara Pentaho Business Analytics Server prior to versions 10.1.0.0 and 9.3.0.7, including 8.3.x allow a malicious URL to inject content into the Analyzer plugin interface.
